title: Riley Sheehan Targets Vuelta Win: America’s Next Big Classics Star Ready to Show Potential
content:
From crit racing to the WorldTour, Sheehan hopes to cap his meteoric rise with a breakaway victory at the Vuelta: 'Good chances to go for a stage.'

Read the full article at Riley Sheehan Targets Vuelta Win: America’s Next Big Classics Star Ready to Show Potential on Velo.
author: ahood
